WorkItem.ClosedComment: Work in progress, but no use having a ticket for it. I'd rather have it work slowly but correctly so I'm working on the model first.Some tips though:* If you know your rotation, then set it as custom and enable 'don't optimize rotation'. This will prevent the model from trying every possible rotation every time something is calculated.* If you don't know your exact rotation but do do know parts of it then set those parts at least (for example turning off SS and Evis for Assassination Rogue, RS and Hemo don't matter as you won't have the talent anyway).* If you don't have to provide the armor debuff make sure you turn on the buff the other person is giving, otherwise the model will turn on Expose Armor calcs.
WorkItem.Description:
Description: Rawr runs extremely slow, almost to the point that it seems to lock up. It takes two or three minutes to change an item. 
 
Steps to Reproduce:
1) Import a Rogue from game with addon, or from armory
2) Load Rawr on EJ or stand-alone either one
 
Observations:
1) It takes a long time to populate
2) Changing an item, gem, chant. Takes a serious long time.
3) Will not Optimize, even after you are patient waiting on the above.
 
Additional Information: 
Rawr 4.0.15 Beta
Windows 7 and XP-3
 
I am basing the speed off of the fact that I can manipulate items, gems, optimize, etc. On my Mage without any slowness. It is almost instant. Closer to the old WOLK Rawr.

Comments.Message:
Thank you. I understand a work in progress.
just for info

Glyphs are showing but not in the right area's (Prime, Major, Minor)

Hit is showing incorrect, I have 1098 on my current build. the (tooltip shows White# over cap by 311, Yellow# over cap by 934, Poison# over cap by 1360)  am I missing something? If I am not incorrect 
with 3/3 Precision  Yellow#241 (2%),  Poisons# 1127 (11%), White# 2523 (21%) are the caps. I could be wrong.

Expertise on my build is 737, (Tooltip shows Over the cap by 523) Again unless I am incorrect, Expertise Cap for Gnomes is 691 (23%), and all others 781 (26%)

I just want to help get Rawr.Rogue from the "Partially" column to the "Fully" column. I have used Rawr for years, any data that is needed to help it along the way I would be more than happy to help.

Thanks again, and keep up the good work.
